description: A React functional component named BarcodeScanInput that provides a styled input field for barcode scanning, including a scanning button, autofocus, and input handling logic.

methods.name: BarcodeScanInput
methods.description: React functional component for barcode input with scan handling, autofocus, and a scan button.

methods.name: submit
methods.description: Handles the submission of the barcode input by trimming the input, invoking the detection callback, and clearing the input.
